column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I paid $5 extra to go into the Van Gogh exhibit they had on display. This line took a lot longer
column2: likely around 30-40 minutes. They were controlling the amount of people let in at once to enhance the experience. However
column4: when I got inside there were droves of people
column5: still making it hard to appreciate the work or timeline of Van Gogh's wife
column6: as someone was always walking in front of you or immediately by your side.
